answer:
ImmunizeBC does not provide travel vaccine advice. Find out which vaccines may be recommended or required for your destination here.
In BC, travel vaccines are available from travel health clinics, most pharmacies and some doctors' offices. There is a charge for most travel vaccines.
Immunization Nurse
